ComicInfo.Summary:
Cullen Bunn! Andrea Mutti!
In a twisted dream world, a nameless stranger battles nightmares in his hunt for his missing son--while in the waking world, the boy's parents find their lives falling apart. As the search for his son in his dreams carries on a bizarre plot is uncovered of children being used as bait for monsters.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Andrea Mutti | 1 | B | Variant Cover | Patric Reynolds & Lee Loughridge | 2 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-29 21:47:09. [CVDB883143]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Andrea Mutti, Lee Loughridge, Patric Reynolds
ComicInfo.Editor: Chuck Howitt, Daniel Chabon, Konner Knudsen
